name: Riva Digital Media
overview: Riva Digital Media offers media and entertainment services in Europe and the Far East. It specializes in media rights, Internet technology, TV telephony, and telecommunications. The company provides an online payment mechanism that creates a commercially viable non-subscription and non-credit card model that allows media brands to create an impulse buy revenue opportunity from their content. It also offers a suite of data services, including outlining geographic uptake, and merging the data acquired with an array of other data sources comprising electoral role, lifestyle surveys, financial activity, property information, and car market data. Riva Digital Media, Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.

funding_rounds.source_description: Investment in Riva Digital Media Ltd
